title: Cinnamon topped blueberry muffins
ingredients: ['For the muffins', '200g (7oz) plain flour', '150g (5oz) caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '75ml (2½fl oz) vegetable oil', '1 egg', '75ml (3oz) milk', '150g (5oz) fresh blueberries', 'Topping', '100g (3¾oz) caster sugar', '50g (2oz) plain flour', '50g (2oz) butter, cubed', '1½ teaspoons ground cinnamon']
